
#include <iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
int a[1000];
int findmin(int size)
{
    int i,min=99999;
    for(i=0;i<size;i++)
    {
        if(a[i]==-1 || a[i]==0)
            continue;
        if(a[i]<min)
            min=a[i];
    }
    return min;
}
bool check(int size)
{
    int i;
    for(i=0;i<size;i++)
    {
        if(a[i]>0)
            return true;
    }
    return false;
}
int sub(int size,int min)
{
    int i,count=0;
    for(i=0;i<size;i++)
    {
        if(a[i]<=0)
            continue;
        else
        {
            count++;
            a[i] = a[i]-min;
        }
    }
    return count;
}
int main()
{
    int n,i,min,gol=0;
    int operation=0;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        scanf("%d",&a[i]);
    while(check(n))
    {
        if(gol==3)
            break;
        min = findmin(n);
        operation = sub(n,min);
        printf("%d\n",operation);
    }

    return 0;
}
